channel.title: Dinner on Toorrenaer Recepten
channel.description: Recent content in Dinner on Toorrenaer Recepten

item.title: Vegetable risotto with spinach
item.description: Peal the unions and cut them in pieces. Clean and cut the mushrooms Slice the garlic Fry the onion and mushrooms Add Italian herbs and garlic Stir and the mixture Add the rice Stir the rice until it is glossy Add the broth little by little After about 20 minutes the rice is cooked. Add the parmesan cheese Add pepper to taste In another frying pan, stir-fry the spinach

item.title: Savoury tart with spinach and ham and tomato
item.description: Preheat the oven to 180 degrees. Remove the puff pastry sheets from the freezer and let them come to room temperature. Meanwhile, cut the bell pepper into cubes and finely chop the garlic. Pour a very small dash of oil into a frying pan and let the spinach wilt over a low heat. Once it has shrunk squeeze out the liquid from the spinach using, for example, a sieve. Fry the bell pepper and garlic for another minute.

item.title: Wrap kip met groene chutney
item.description: Voorbereiding Kipfilet chicken seasoning Was de kipfilets en dep ze droog. Maak insnijdingen in de kip zodat de kruiden goed kunnen intrekken. Marineer de kip met 1 tsp chilipoeder, 1 tsp korianderpoeder, 1 tsp kurkumapoeder, 1 tsp komijnpoeder, 1 tsp garam masala, 1 tsp Italiaanse kruiden, 1 tsp chilivlokken, 1 tsp gember-knoflookpasta, 3 tbsps yoghurt en sap van 1/2 citroen. Meng goed en laat minimaal 1 tot 2 uur marineren. Verhit 1 tbsp boter of olie in een koekenpan.
